Package net.groboclown.retval

Class CloseableCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.groboclown.retval.ideas.CloseableCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    @Immutable
public class CloseableCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A container for multiple AutoCloseable (and thus Closeable) objects.

    The collection is primarily used to keep track of values that should be closed at the end of a Ret* call chain.

        Combine this collection with the argument's closeables.
        Parameters:
